casebody.data:
STATE v. CANTY. No. COA06-42. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed December 19, 2006. Certification Date January 8, 2007. Appeal from Guilford (04CRS24100, 04CRS24101, 04CRS24102, 04CRS24103, 04CRS24104, 04CRS24300, 04CRS24303, 04CRS68556).

Case reported without published opinion. Reversed.
